alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 11:33PM EST until January 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... French Broad River At Blantyre affecting Henderson and Transylvania Counties. .Elevated water levels continue along the the upper reaches of the French Broad River. Additional heavy rainfall is likely Friday afternoon, which may lead to another spike in stages through the weekend. New forecasts on Friday will incorporate the latest expected rainfall and update the potential crest information. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...French Broad River at Blantyre. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet and greater, Minor Flood Stage. Farmland flooding continues on both sides of the French Broad River. Floodwaters begin to impact boat access areas at Grove Bridge Rd. and Crab Creek Rd. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:16 PM EST Thursday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:16 PM EST Thursday was 19.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue falling today, but then another rise in levels is anticipated tonight into the weekend following additional rainfall. New crest information will be provided late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. For detailed information including observed and forecast stages, flood impacts, flood history, FEMA Flood Hazard Layers, and more, please visit: https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=gsp The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1145 AM EST.
